transport.question: I go beep beep! I have wheels and take you places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 Daddy drives one!
🛣️ You sit in a car seat in me.
🚦 I stop at red lights.

transport.question: I go choo choo! I ride on tracks. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I carry lots of people.
💨 I make a loud whistle.
🛤️ I follow a special path.

transport.question: I float on the water and take people on trips. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move.
⚓️ I have an anchor.
🚢 I can be big or small.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You wear a helmet when you ride me.
🔔 I have a bell to ring.
🦵 You use your legs to move me.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take you far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings.
☁️ I fly above the clouds.
💺 You sit in a seat when you ride me.

transport.question: I'm big and yellow and take kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I stop to pick up children.
👧 You see lots of kids on me.
🚦 I have flashing lights when I stop.

transport.question: I help people who are hurt get to the hospital fast. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I have a siren.
🚑 I have a red cross on me.
👩‍⚕️ Doctors and nurses ride in me.

transport.question: I carry things, not people, and sometimes I rumble loudly. What am I?

hints.text: 🪨 I often carry rocks, sand, or dirt.
👷 Workers use me on building sites.
🚚 I'm a kind of big truck.

transport.question: I zoom through space and visit other planets! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I travel very, very fast.
🧑‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🌌 I go to the moon and stars.

transport.question: I have a motor, but I only have two wheels, and you wear a helmet to ride me. What am I?

hints.text: 🏍️ I am similar to a bike, but faster.
👨‍✈️ Police officers sometimes use me.
💨 I can go very fast on the road.

plant.question: I am green and grow tall. Monkeys love to eat my yellow fruit. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys peel me before eating
💛 I am a popular fruit snack
🌴 I grow on a tree

plant.question: I am red and round and yummy to eat. You can find me in an apple pie. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White liked me, but not the poisoned one!
🐛 Sometimes you find a worm inside me.
🌳 I grow on trees in orchards.

plant.question: I'm long and orange and bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 I help bunnies see very well
🥕 I am a root vegetable
🌱 I grow in the ground

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. When you pop me open, you find little green balls inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥄 People like to eat me as a side with dinner
🟢 I am green, like a frog!
🪴 You can grow me in your garden

plant.question: I am a tall grass with a thick stem. You can make yummy syrup from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I have joints or nodes on my stem.
🥞 People put sweet syrup that comes from me on pancakes!
🎋 Pandas love to eat me!

plant.question: I have a prickly outside and a sweet inside. I grow on a plant in a warm place. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ I like hot weather.
🌵 I am often found in deserts.
💧 Some people believe I can help you if you are thirsty.

plant.question: I have many leaves and a strong trunk. Birds build nests in my branches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 My leaves can change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me to find acorns.
🏠 I am a home for many animals.

plant.question: I am a flower that follows the sun. My seeds are yummy to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I am very bright and yellow!
☀️ I turn to face the sun.
🍪 My seeds are yummy to roast and eat in cookies!

plant.question: I am a vine that climbs. My fruit can be green, red, or black. What am I?

hints.text: 🍷 I am often used to make juice and wine.
🍇 You can eat me right off the vine!
☀️ I like to grow in sunny places.

plant.question: I have a strong smell and pretty purple flowers. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💜 My scent can help you relax.
🧼 Some people use me to make soap.
🐝 I am very attractive to bees.
